WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The Latest on U.S .- China trade tensions ( all times local ) : [ARGM-TMP: 1:30 p.m.] [ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: taking] on [ARG1: Mexico and Canada] [ARGM-TMP: at a time]
